overview:
High-quality and reasonably-priced Spanish, Portuguese, English and Quechua translations from ArgentinaÂ´s premier agency

Ocean Translations is a global Language Service Provider, offering translation and DTP solutions and delivering world-class projects using state-of-the-art technologies and proven processes. As Argentinaâ€™s premier translation company, we work closely with hundreds of international companies and multilateral organizations from the pharmaceutical and medical sectors to the legal, manufacturing and hospitality industries.

Full Service Translation Company

As a full-service translation provider, our services not only include translation, edition and proofreading as a standard but we also count on an in-house team of graphic designers and engineers, working on the latest software products, and delivering high quality desktop publishing services.

We offer interpretation and text translation from English to Spanish or Portuguese, from Spanish to Portuguese, from Spanish into English; we also specialize in cultural and linguistic localization for the different Spanish flavors (Latin American Spanish with countries variations, US Spanish, Neutral Spanish and Spanish from Spain).

As an ISO 9001:2008 certified company, we produce accurate and timely-delivered translations. We place quality first! Our convictions demand that quality is always the dominating ideal in the services we provide. Our goal is to deliver a customized service to each of our clients and build long-term business partnerships.

Contact us to discuss your forthcoming translations projects or any other queries.
